Package eu.df.jiffybox

Class JiffyBoxApi

java.lang.Object
eu.df.jiffybox.JiffyBoxApi
public class JiffyBoxApi
extends java.lang.Object
This is the base class of the JiffyBox API. Usually is should be created only once. You have to specify the API token to use. Furthermore is is possible to add a host, which is useful for testing purposes.
See Also:
ModuleBackups, ModuleContactGroups, ModuleDistributions, ModuleDoc, ModuleIps, ModuleJiffyBoxes, ModuleMonitoring, ModulePlans

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    JiffyBoxApi​(java.lang.String token)
    Create a new instance using a specified token and the default host.
    JiffyBoxApi​(java.lang.String token, java.lang.String host)
    Create a new instance using a specified token and host.
